column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Best pancakes I have ever eaten. The wait time was 45 minutes to get seated
column2: but once your food arrives you forget all about the wait time. Our waiter
column5: adding helpful tips about what to order. I ordered the Mexicana skillet
column6: that came with two buttermilk pancakes
column7: and my boyfriend ordered the white chocolate raspberry pancakes. The skillet came with some tasty salsa. My boyfriend didn't finish his pancakes
column8: but it's all good I finished them for him. The pancakes were really the stars of the show
column10: and then our drinks the berry smoothie and mocha coconut coffee.
